raw_text: MRS. REGINA ANANDA (nee GANHEWAGE) – Beloved wife of late Air Commodore R.A. Ananda,​ loving mother of Sumudu,​ mother-in-law of Sajindra Jayasena,​ loving grandmother of Minuki,​ Nethuki,​ sister of Violet Jinadasa,​ Tissa Ganhewage,​ late Chandra Range,​ sister-in-law of Sujatha Jayasena. Remains lie at ‘The Restpect Home’ Jayaratne Funeral Parlour on 13th December. Cortege leaves Parlour on 13th afternoon for Cremation at General Cemetery,​ Borella. Family contact number : 0777316509.081931
